sourcesContent:
import "../../style/pages/home.css" import chatIcon from "../../assets/img/icon-chat.png" import moneyIcon from "../../assets/img/icon-money.png" import securityIcon from "../../assets/img/icon-security.png" import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom" import { useStore } from "react-redux" import { useEffect } from "react" function Home () { const store = useStore() const savedToken = localStorage.getItem("token") const navigate = useNavigate() useEffect(()=> { if (savedToken) { store.dispatch({type:"setToken",payload:savedToken}) navigate("/user") console.log("token trouvé") } else if (store.getState().connected === true) { navigate("/user") } },[]) return (

Promoted Content

No fees.

No minimum deposit.

High interest rates.

Open a savings account with Argent Bank today!

Features

You are our #1 priority

Need to talk to a representative? You can get in touch through our 24/7 chat or through a phone call in less than 5 minutes.

More savings means higher rates

The more you save with us, the higher your interest rate will be!

Security you can trust

We use top of the line encryption to make sure your data and money is always safe.

) } export default Home
